title: Shin Tennis no Ouji-sama OVA vs. Genius 10
original_name: 新テニスの王子様 OVA vs Genius10
opening_song: "Kakumei e no Prelude (革命への前奏曲（プレリュード）)" by Keigo Atobe (Junichi Suwabe)
sinopse: This OVA series is a continuation of The New Prince of Tennis series from 2012, still set in the U-17 High School Representatives Selection Camp. The story follows the matches played when the First Strings return from their tour.
